name: crew-stereotyped

description:
feat(DIRECTORY-MAPPER): :sparkles: Versionning & Installer Re-Logic

feat: 🚀 Ajout de fonctionnalités pour le déploiement et la gestion des versions

- Ajout d'un script `deploy.py` pour faciliter le déploiement et la gestion des versions.
- Intégration de la génération automatique du nom de version.
- Utilisation dynamique de la version actuelle depuis le fichier `manifest.json`.
- Ajout de logs et d'emojis pour rendre le script plus informatif et divertissant.
- Exécution de la commande `git push` avec la branche spécifiée dans `manifest.json` après le déploiement.
- Windows Installer Rebuild.
name: constellation-dry

description:
✨ Implemented modular command-line interface with dedicated commands for 'view', 'create', and 'check-update'.
🛠 Enhanced and organized command-line options for better user experience.
📝 Updated README with comprehensive usage instructions and detailed TOC.
🌐 Translated README to English, maintaining a consistent and user-friendly tone.
🚀 Added HTML version of the usage section for better web presentation.
🔄 Refactored and optimized codebase for cleaner and more efficient execution.
🎨 Added emojis throughout the code and documentation for a more lively and engaging experience.
🌟 Implemented an update checker script for users to easily check and apply updates.
📄 Created an HTML version of the README for improved online readability.
📰 Provided social media-friendly descriptions for better project promotion.
👾 Handled various user prompts, error messages, and validations for a more user-friendly experience.
🚢 Prepared the project for deployment with an update checker and installation scripts.
📚 Generated comprehensive and dynamic TOC for the README.
🧹 Refactored and reorganized code for better readability and maintainability.
🔄 Updated the update-checker script to support both Windows and Linux.
🌈 Improved ASCII art in the directory mapper script.
💻 Created a deployment script that updates the version in manifest.json, updates version-history.json, and pushes changes to the repository.
📢 Added a startup ASCII art message in the directory mapper script.
🔧 Implemented a dynamic approach for specifying colors in ASCII art.
📥 Enhanced the installation script to include additional dependencies and improve user interaction.
🎉 Celebrated successful installations with colorful and dynamic messages.
🔍 Added a check for existing installations in the installation script, allowing users to choose to reinstall.
🔐 Implemented administrative privilege checks in the Windows installation script.
💬 Improved and expanded user prompts and messages for clarity and engagement.
🔄 Enhanced the update-checker script to support multiple platforms and display relevant update instructions.
🏷 Updated manifest.json with additional information and improved formatting.
🚨 Addressed issues related to missing parameters and errors in the directory mapper script.
💄 Added color options and improved formatting for better visual appeal.
🗃 Organized and optimized codebase for better maintainability and extensibility.
📋 Generated a complete HTML version of the README with an attractive and structured layout.
🚀 Created a powerful and flexible command-line tool for managing directory structures.
🌐 Expanded the project's global reach through translation and language support.
🌐 Improved the global accessibility of the project by providing an English version of the documentation.
🤖 Automated version incrementation and update history entry in the deployment script.
🌐 Globalized the project by providing documentation in multiple languages.
📚 Documented and showcased various usage scenarios and commands in the README.
🎨 Beautified and stylized the README with consistent formatting and emojis.
🔗 Linked relevant sections in the README for easy navigation.
💼 Provided professional and engaging descriptions for social media promotion.
🚀 Successfully deployed and promoted the project for widespread adoption.
🇺🇸 Converted The Whole Project to English for Better understanding world wide.
name: family-fine

description:
feat(DIRECTORY-MAPPER): :sparkles: Changed & Improved Create Directory Function

🔨 Further improvements to the create_directory function to handle different types of input, either a JSON file path or a dictionary directly.
name: raspberry-kaput

description:
feat: 🚀 Integrate Settings Manager and Menu

- ✨ Added a comprehensive Settings Manager (`settings_manager.py`) for reading, updating, and resetting settings in `settings.json`.
- 🖌️ Created an interactive Settings Menu (`settings_menu.py`) using `npyscreen` for users to edit and reset various tree builder parameters.
- 🔄 Updated the `dir_tree_builder` function in `orbit_tree_builder.py` to dynamically fetch styling parameters from the Settings Manager.
- 📝 Adjusted the structure of the `settings.json` file to include default values for tree builder parameters.

refactor: 🛠️ Refactor Settings JSON Handling

- 🔄 Refactored the `SettingsForm` class in the Settings Menu to correctly handle attribute assignments, eliminating an `AttributeError`.
- 🌐 Improved the structure and readability of the code, added logs, emojis, and meaningful comments.
name: schnitzel-scintillating
